item.title: Three Decades of the Philippine Stock Exchange Index: Closing Prices, Returns, and a Naive Simulation
item.description: 1 Rise and Fall of Stocks 2 Thirty Years of PSEi Prices 3 Ups and Downs but Going Up 4 Month-to-Month Returns 5 Buy and Hold 5.1 Simulating Buy and Hold Over Three Decades of PSEi 5.2 More Than a Million 6 Bank Deposit vs Buy and Hold Investment 7 Next Thirty Years: Another Million? library(knitr) library(tidyverse) library(quantmod) library(magrittr) library(janitor) library(ggthemes) library(ggsci) library(drlib) library(lubridate) library(scales) opts_chunk$set( message = FALSE, warning = FALSE, echo = TRUE, fig.
